title.en: Kinou Nani Tabeta? - Kenji to Shiro-san (Doujinshi)

altTitles.en: What Did You Eat Yesterday? - Kenji and Shiro-san (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: きのう何食べた？ - ケンジとシロさん (Doujinshi)

description.en:
Title: Kenji and Shiro-san 1  
Circle: Yoshinaga Fumi  
Fandom: What did you eat Yesterday?  
Pairing: Nobuyuki x Shirou, Kenji x Shirou  
  
Title: Kenji and Shiro-san 2  
Circle: Yoshinaga Fumi  
Fandom: What did you eat Yesterday?  
Pairing: Kenji x Shirou

The boy’s strongest first love, a witch who rules over the world with her body and strength! Kuozaki Saika. The most powerful witch who has been saving the world from destruction every 3XX hours, and the director of the magicians’ school.

“…I entrust you, my world…”

And then… the first girl the boy ever loved died, entrusting her body and power to Kuga Mushiki.

Instructed by the servant of Saika, Kuga Mushiki is tasked with attending school as his now-deceased lover so that no one finds out the truth…

He’s feared by his classmates and even his teachers. His life becomes even more troublesome as he reunites with his younger sister who asks for counseling about her love for her own brother- him!

As Lee Yeo-ju hums a song that comforted her during her long hospital stay, she is approached by an idol star named Park Jae-ha, whom she has only seen in videos. "I'll help you. You need money for the surgery, right?" Jae-ha becomes Yeo-ju's savior and favorite. However, five years later, he ends his life by making an extreme choice... Yeo-ju, in shock, cries out to a shooting star to save him. Did her wish come true? She goes back seven years and possesses the body of Jang Bo-ran, a top idol at the time and a judge on the audition program "I Am the Strongest Idol"... Among the audition participants is trainee Park Jae-ha! "Just like you saved me, I will save you this time."

title.en: The Three Skills I Received, When Combined, Were The Most Powerful

altTitles.ja: 貰った三つの外れスキル、合わせたら最強でした

altTitles.ja-ro: Moratta Mittsu no Hazure Skill, Awasetara Saikyō Deshita

altTitles.en: Moratta Mittsu no Hazure Skill, Awasetara Saikyou Deshita

description.en:
Mutou Kushina's life, filled with brutality, came to an abrupt end. In his new incarnation, the goddess granted him three abilities: [Super Speedy Regeneration], [Agelessness], and [Grit: Indomitable Spirit].

However, those skills were outlier skills that were not offensive skills!

The place where he was reborn with such skills is the Forest of Endless Calamity, where a large number of Danger Level S monsters roam, one of which is capable of destroying the world.

Having no offensive skills, Kushina's  should have been killed by the monsters right away, but...?

With all three skills, he can instantly regenerate no matter what kind of attack he receives! And every time he is attacked, he gets stronger and stronger...
description.ja:
壮絶な前世の末、命を落とした少年・無倒屈止無（むとう くしな）。

転生する際に女神に貰ったのは【超速再生】【不老】【根性：不撓不屈】という３つのスキル。しかし、それらのスキルは攻撃系のスキルではない外れスキルだった！

そんなスキルを持って転生した先は、“危険度S”の1匹で世界を滅ぼせる程のモンスターが大量に闊歩している【果ての災厄の森】。

攻撃系のスキルを持たない屈止無はすぐにモンスターに殺されるはずだったが……？

３つのスキルを組み合わせたらどんな攻撃を受けても瞬時に再生！しかも攻撃される度に強くなっていき―

title.en: Since When Do Guys Find Divorcees Attractive?

altTitles.ja: バツイチがモテるなんて聞いてません

altTitles.fr: Qui Aurait Su Que Les Divorcées Étaient Aussi Populaires

description.en: "I'm going to enjoy my second time being single!". Ono Kazuha has divorced her husband at 35 over an affair. She stood tall and announced "I'm officially divorced" to the fashion magazine's editorial department where she works. To add insult to injury, a handsome new hire happened to overhear. She expected it to be awkward, but for some reason it made him attracted to her?
description.fr: "Je vais profiter de ma deuxième fois en tant que célibataire !". Ono Kazuha a divorcé son mari à 35 ans à cause d'une tromperie. Elle s'est tenue debout et a annoncé "Je suis officiellement divorcée" au département éditorial du magazine de mode où elle travaille. Pour ajouter l'insulte à la blessure, un beau nouvel employé l'a entendue par hasard. Elle s'attendait à ce que ce soit gênant, mais pour une raison quelconque, cela l'a attiré par elle ?
description.ja: 「二度目の独身ライフ楽しみます！」。　夫の不倫が原因で35歳で離婚、バツイチとなった小野和葉。強がって職場のファッション誌編集部で「晴れてバツイチとなりました」と宣言するも、そこにたまたま居合わせたイケメン新入社員に聞かれ踏んだり蹴ったり。しかし、気まずい感じになるかと思いきや、なぜか懐かれてしまい…？

title.en: I Hold the Heart of a Tyrant

description.en:
The Crown Prince’s only friend, me, Euseniel Heartland.

One day, our family was expelled from the capital for having had a bad influence on the Crown Prince. But after 14 years, we finally reunite, However,  he has changed drastically.

When asked why he changed, the Crown Prince answers that it is because he wanted to be the ideal man for me. But no, this is not the friend I used to know anymore, And it's not only his appearance what has changed, I'm sure there something else on the inside that's not the same as before. What could it be?

title.en: The Café Terrace and Its Goddesses

description.en:
Kasukabe Hayato has been accepted to Tokyo U on his first try. Receiving news of his grandmother's death, he returns to his childhood home, Cafe Terrace Familia, for the first time in three years to find five strange girls there who claim to be "Grandma's Family"! Hayato's unexpected life in a seaside town with these five girls of fate begins here!  
  
In this handsome harem under one roof by Koji Seo of *Suzuka*, *Kimi no Iru Machi*, and *Fuuka*, which girl will you fall in love with? A seaside love comedy with too many heroines!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10009/episode/319474) (U.S. Only)
description.ru: Спустя три года, после ссоры со своей бабушкой, Хаято Касукабэ возвращается в свой родной дом в котором поселилось пять девушек. Выясняется, что бабушка Хаято позволила девушкам жить в этом доме, а те заботились о ней до самой её смерти. Так начинается история Хаято и пяти "Богинь".

altTitles.vi: Dù thế nào đi nữa / đó là tình bạn Naniwa

description.en: Guruguru Osaka, crackling ring! Now, the piston in my crotch is tingling!! I like picking up girls more than having three meals. Naniwa's youthful pleasure of being popular and having sex. I'm not a fart with a big loan either. I want to buy a new Silvia. I don't have the skill (technique), but I can't give up on my lewd spirit. An 18-year-old boy is making his ring debut!!

Lin Ling is unfortunate in everything she does… Until the day she met Fang Wan, a kind and perfect upperclassman. She unconsciously grew attracted to her. Somewhere in the vast universe, there is always someone who is closely connected with you, and if fate allows it, you will never be alone.

title.en: Danzai sareta Akuyaku Reijou wa, Gyakkou shite Kanpeki na Akujo wo Mezasu

altTitles.ja: 断罪された悪役令嬢は、逆行して完璧な悪女を目指す
断罪された悪役令嬢は、逆行して完璧な悪女を目指す＠COMIC

altTitles.ja-ro: Danzaisareta Akuyaku Reijou wa, Gyakkou shite Kanpeki na Akujo wo Mezasu
Danzaisareta Akuyaku Reijou wa, Gyakkou shite Kanpeki na Akujo wo Mezasu @COMIC

altTitles.en: The Condemned Villainess Goes Back in Time and Aims to Become the Ultimate Villain

altTitles.es-la: La villana condenada regresa en el tiempo para convertirse en la villana perfecta

altTitles.ko: 단죄당한 악역 영애는 회귀하여 완벽한 악녀를 노린다

altTitles.zh: 被定罪的恶人千金、重生后目标是成为完美恶女

description.en:
An exhilarating romantic fantasy about a duke's daughter, a former prostitute, controlling the poison within evil!

The duke's daughter, Claudia, was supposed to be the fiancée of the crown prince, however her half-sister, Fermina's, schemes had her sold off to a brothel. She didn't want to end it like this, so she climbed to the top at the brothel, but ended up dying from an illness. Except, when she opened her eyes, the face of when she was a child looked back at her. Realizing she had gone back in time, Claudia wins over more and more supporters using the tactics she learnt during her days as a prostitute to prepare for her nearing conflict with Fermina.

"If Fermina is considered a villainess, I shall aim to become the ultimate villain!"
description.ja:
「あなたが悪女なら、それを超える"完璧な悪女"になってみせますわ! 」

王太子の婚約者だったはずが、異母妹・フェルミナの策略により娼館へと売られてしまった公爵令嬢・クラウディア。このまま終わるわけにはいかないという一心で娼館のナンバーワンに上りつめるも、病死してしまう。しかし、目が覚めると鏡には子供の頃の自分が! 過去へ逆行したクラウディアは、きたるべきフェルミナとの戦いに向けて、娼婦として身につけた手練手管で周りを次々と味方に引き込んでいく——。

---
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6406gp/)

**Original Web Publication:** [Corona Comics](https://to-corona-ex.com/comics/49602840559659), [Nico Video](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/58462)
description.es-la: La hija del duque, Claudia, debía ser la prometida del príncipe heredero, sin embargo, los planes de su hermanastra, Fermina, hicieron que la vendieran a un burdel. Ella no quería terminar de esa manera, así que escaló a la cima del burdel, pero terminó muriendo de una enfermedad. Pero cuando abrió los ojos, la cara de una niña le devolvió la mirada. Al darse cuenta de que ha retrocedido en el tiempo, Claudia gana cada vez más adeptos utilizando las tácticas que aprendió durante sus días como prostituta para prepararse para su inminente conflicto con Fermina. "Si Fermina es considerada una villana, ¡yo aspiraré a convertirme en la villana perfecta!"

title.en: Shy na Ano Ko ni Natsukaretai

altTitles.ja: シャイなあの子に懐かれたい

altTitles.en: I Want To Be Liked By That Shy Girl

altTitles.ja: 炎の闘球女 ドッジ弾子

description.en: A modern version of the legendary manga "Flaming Ball boy Dodge Danpei" a hot blooded dodgeball manga! Danko, who inherited Danpei's soul struggles to create the strongest super dodgeball team in the Reiwa era! Will Danko be able to overcome the common sense of the modern world!? Look forward to all the beautiful girls passionately drawn by Koshita Tatsuhiro.

As a child, Thorfinn sat at the feet of the great Leif Ericson and thrilled to wild tales of a land far to the west. But his youthful fantasies were shattered by a mercenary raid. Raised by the Vikings who murdered his family, Thorfinn became a terrifying warrior, forever seeking to kill the band's leader, Askeladd, and avenge his father. Sustaining Thorfinn through his ordeal are his pride in his family and his dreams of a fertile westward land, a land without war or slavery… the land Leif called Vinland.  

---
- **Won the Japan Media Arts Award Division Grand Prize in 2009**
- **Won the 36th Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2012**
description.ru: Эта история случилась в начале XI века, когда викинги, безраздельно господствовавшие в северных морях, грабили побережья Франции и Англии. В эпоху, где оружие значило больше, нежели слова, маленький мальчик невольно оказывается косвенной причиной гибели своего отца. Повзрослев и став на путь воина, он жаждет честного поединка с убийцей отца – легендарным главарём отряда викингов-наемников, но возраст и отсутствие опыта не позволяют ему сделать это. Чтобы не упускать своего врага из виду, юноша вступает в его отряд и в награду за выполнение тяжелого боевого задания требует поединка с ним, но терпит поражение. Юноша продолжает прилагать все усилия, чтобы осуществить свою месть. Внезапно он оказывается вовлечён в куда более кровавое столкновение…
description.tr: Çocukken Thorfinn, büyük Leif Ericson'un ayaklarının dibinde oturur ve batıdaki uzak diyarların vahşi masallarıyla heyecanlanırdı. Ama gençlik hayalleri bir paralı asker baskınıyla paramparça oldu. Ailesini öldüren Vikingler tarafından yetiştirilen Thorfinn, grubun lideri Askeladd'ı öldürmek ve babasının intikamını almak isteyen korkunç bir savaşçı oldu. Thorfinn'i çileli yaşamı boyunca ayakta tutan, ailesiyle olan gururu ve batıdaki bereketli topraklara, savaşın ve köleliğin olmadığı bir ülkeye, Leif'in Vinland adını verdiği topraklara dair hayalleridir.
description.pt-br: Thorfinn é filho de Thors, um lendário guerreiro viking, mas que após anos no campo de batalha, descobre uma coisa mais maravilhosa que matar seus iguais. Viver sua própria vida, em paz. Mas os ventos lhe trazem uma notícia que atrapalhará seus dias de paz, e Thorfinn, seu filho, pouco sabe desta vida passada de guerra de seu pai. Após descobrir o passado de seu pai, Thorfinn se revolta contra ele, e sai para a guerra junto de seu pai, mas quando reconhece o verdadeiro valor dele, já é tarde demais. Agora Thorfinn deverá seguir sua própria vida, seguindo valores que seu pai lhe ensinou, mas sem perder sua coragem. Este é só o começo desta grande saga de Thorfinn que acompanha os Vikings no século XI!

title.en: Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san

altTitles.ja: 時々ボソッとロシア語でデレる隣のアーリャさん

altTitles.ru: Аля, которая сидит рядом со мной, иногда кокетничает со мной по-русски
Аля-сан иногда кокетничает со мной по-русски

altTitles.vi: Arya-san bàn bên thi thoảng lại trêu ghẹo tôi bằng tiếng Nga

altTitles.zh-hk: 不時輕聲地以俄語遮羞的鄰座艾莉同學

altTitles.id: Alya-san Terkadang Menyembunyikan Perasaannya dalam Bahasa Rusia

altTitles.pt-br: Alya-san geralmente esconde seus sentimentos em russo

altTitles.ne: आल्या कहिलेकाहीँ रूसी भाषामा आफ्नो भावना लुकाउँछिन्

altTitles.de: Alya verbirgt manchmal ihre Gefühle auf Russisch

altTitles.en: Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian
My Deskmate Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian

altTitles.ja-ro: Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san

altTitles.pl: Alya Czasami Ukrywa Swoje Uczucia Używając Rosyjskiego

altTitles.mn: Аля Заримдаа Орос Хэлээр Сэтгэлээ Нуудаг

altTitles.ms: Alya yang duduk di sebelah saya terkadang membisikkan kata manis dalam bahasa Rusia
اليا يڠ دودوق دسبله ساي ترکادڠ ممبيسيقکن کات مانيس دالم بهاس روسيا

description.en:
"И на меня тоже обрати внимание..."

Alya, the incomparably beautiful silver-haired girl in the next seat over, occasionally mumbles to herself in Russian. She says she switches to it whenever she’s badmouthing me… but I know the truth! I know for a fact that she just said "Pay attention to me, too." to me! 

Masachika Kuze has native-level skills when it comes to Russian comprehension, but Alya has no idea about that... and that’s why she keeps on hiding those sweet feelings about him in her native language!
description.it: Masachika Kuze è seduto accanto ad Alya, una ragazza di origine russa e antenati giapponesi. Lei è bella, altezzosa e una studentessa eccezionale, mentre Masachika è secchione e noto per essere un fannullone. È un bersaglio facile per i suoi commenti in russo, che lei è fin troppo felice di tradurre - tranne per il fatto che lui può capire cosa sta dicendo in realtà!
description.ja: 「И на меня тоже обрати внимание」隣の席に座る絶世の銀髪美少女、アーリャさんは時々ロシア語を話す。本人は俺を罵倒していると言うのだが…事実は違う！さっきのロシア語、彼女は「私のことかまってよ」と言っていたのだ！実は俺、久世政近のロシア語リスニングはネイティブレベルなのである。そんな事とは露知らず、今日も甘々なロシア語でデレてくるアーリャさん！全生徒憧れの的、超ハイスペックなロシアンJKとの青春ラブコメディ！
description.mn:
Аля гэх, хэнтэй ч зүйрлэшгүй үзэсгэлэн, мөнгөлөг үстэй охин, заримдаа дотроо оросоор шивнэдэг. Тэр хэлэхдээ, намайг муулах үедээ л тэгдэг гэж хэлсэн...гэхдээ би орос хэл мэднэ! Саяхан "Надад анхаарал тавиач" гэж хэлэхийг нь би сонссон!

Масачика Күзэ орос хэлийг уугуул түвшний чадамжаар ойлгодог, гэвч Аля үүнийг мэдэхгүй...тийм болохоор өөрийнхөө сэтгэлийг орос хэлээр нуудаг!
description.pl: Masachika Kuze siedzi obok Alyi, dziewczyny pochodzenia rosyjsko - japońskiego. Jest piękną, wyniosłą i wyjątkową uczennicą, podczas gdy Masachika jest kujonem znanym z bycia leniem. Jest on więc łatwym celem dla jej komentarzy, które chętnie tłumaczy na rosyjski - z wyjątkiem tego, że on może zrozumieć, co mówi naprawdę!
description.ru: Манга по одноимённой новелле! Главный герой – Кудзе Масачика, учится в частном институте Сейрей, куда частенько попадают ученики из разных стран. Вдруг в классе Кудзе появилась новенькая. Девушка с бледной, почти прозрачной кожей, которую невозможно было увидеть у настоящих японцев, и длинными голубыми глазами-щелочками, сияющими, как сапфиры. Это была Аля – Русская девушка, что переехала в Японию...
description.vi:
“И наменятоже обрати внимание”

“Hở, gì thế?”

“Có gì đâu? Tôi nói ‘Cái tên này đúng là đồ ngốc’ ý mà.”

“Cậu thôi cái trò mắng người ta bằng tiếng Nga đi!?”

Arya - cô nàng xinh đẹp tuyệt trần có mái tóc bạch kim ngồi cạnh tôi - đang nở một nụ cười đắc thắng...

Nhưng sự thật thì, câu tiếng Nga cô ấy vừa nói có nghĩa là [Hãy để ý đến tôi đi] cơ!

Tôi - Kuze Masachika - là người có khả năng nghe hiểu tiếng Nga thông thạo như người bản xứ. Nhưng không hề hay biết điều đó, cô nàng Arya hôm nay vẫn tiếp tục thể hiện những cảm xúc rất ngọt ngào bằng tiếng Nga khiến tôi không thể ngừng cười!?

Câu chuyện tình thanh xuân hài hước của tôi với cô nàng nữ sinh trung học gốc Nga hoàn hảo đã bắt đầu như thế...
description.pt-br:
Minha colega de classe que senta ao meu lado é meio-russa, chamada Alya, ela tá sempre provocando e sussurrando em russo, só que ela não sabe que entendo muito bem o idioma russo. 

Assim começa um grande comédia romântica.

description.en:
His more-than-friends, less-than-lovers cousin is so cute that he could die!!!!? 

Nozomu is a boy staying at his uncle's house over summer vacation. In the countryside, where there are no convenience stores, or any busses even, the boy has a problem. That problem is his younger cousin, Sou! He’s being led around by this tanned, energetic girl day after day and can’t show her the dignity befitting his older age! On top of that, whether intentional or not, he’s getting flustered by Sou’s inviting demeanor. Eventually, Nozomu couldn’t take his eyes off Sou and is falling more and more under her spell...!!? With a “cousin” like this, his reason is having a hard time hanging on!
description.ja:
友達以上恋人未満な従妹が距離が近すぎて死ぬほど可愛い!!!!?

夏休みの間、叔父の家で過ごすことになった少年・望。山と田んぼが多い田舎で困惑するも、それ以上彼にはある悩みがあった。その原因は「従妹」の爽!! 褐色元気っ娘の彼女に毎回からかわれては年上の威厳を見せられないでいた！ しかも、天然なのか意図的なのか分からない爽の誘ってくるような仕草にドキッとする始末。いつしか、望は彼女のことが目を離せず……!!? こんな「従妹」がいてくれたら理性が持たない!?
description.pt-br:
Seu primo mais que amigo, menos que amante é tão fofo que poderia morrer!!!!?

Nozomu é um garoto que está na casa do tio nas férias de verão. No campo, onde não há lojas de conveniência, nem mesmo ônibus, o garoto tem um problema. Esse problema é seu primo mais novo, Sou! Ele está sendo levado por essa garota bronzeada e cheia de energia dia após dia e não consegue mostrar a ela a dignidade condizente com sua idade avançada!

Além disso, intencionalmente ou não, ele está ficando nervoso com o comportamento convidativo de Sou. Eventualmente, Nozomu não conseguia tirar os olhos de Sou e estava caindo cada vez mais sob seu feitiço...!!? Com ​​uma "prima" como essa, sua razão está tendo dificuldade em se segurar!

Esta é uma comédia romântica com um cara que está afundando com todas as provocações de sua prima bronzeada!

description.en:
Inept at dealing with people, Higawa Koyuki maintains a wall between herself and others. She spends her time in highschool away from others, all alone. At least until she encounters Amamiya Minato who keeps closing the distance between them for some reason?!

The aloof Koyuki, the popular Miki, the boundary-less Minato, and the easygoing and kind basketball team member, Youta. This is the story of these somewhat complicated four, and their tantalizing, bumbling youth!

altTitles.en: The Reincarnation Record of a Misanthrope

description.en:
I don't trust any human being.  
  
An unemployed, virgin 29-years-old Loner man who has a very deep distrust toward humans was trying to save a woman who was almost raped. He is stabbed in the chest by the assaulter and left to die alone while cursing the humans. When he came to, he realized that he had reincarnated in another world as the second son of a lower noble family where magic and spirit exist as a human baby named Ash Hawkwood.  
  
Without talent for [True Magic] or [Swordmanship] this the story about how he build his own empire from scratch by using his own power.
description.ja:
社会に爪弾きにされ、世の中に絶望していた一人の青年は、孤独死によりその生涯を終えた。しかし、彼は見捨てられなかった。神の加護により、魔法と奴隷制度のある異世界へ転生。田舎の貴族としてアッシュという名前で新たな人生を歩むことになった。
順風満帆な生活が送れるかと思いきや、アッシュにはある問題が。魔法を中心に動く世界で彼には全く魔力がなく、【精霊の力】を使える異端児だった！！?
使い方次第で絶対的な力を発揮する【精霊の力】を得たアッシュ。
彼は【精霊使い】として魔力が絶対的な優位性を持ち、奴隷をゴミのように扱う世界を正すべく、奴隷たちと共に成り上がっていく！！

「神眼の勇者」「異世界チート開拓記」のファースト氏による「小説家になろう」発、妖精無双ファンタジーを大胆コミカライズ化！！世の理不尽を痛快にスプラッタ&スクラップ！！そして可愛い奴隷たちとえちえちに酔いしれろ！！

description.en: What happens when a girl from a quaint and small town meets the son of a Yakuza crime lord? Will she be able to change him for the better or will he continue down the dangerous and violent path?

Shou, a young boy living in the red light district is suddenly taken to live in the imperial palace. He was selected to become the prince's shadow and act as his shield. In the palace where conspiracies swirl will Shou be able to protect himself and the prince?
description.ja: 遊郭生まれの孤児・宵はある日＂影武者＂として王宮に召し抱えられ、自分と同じ顔のワガママな皇太子・冠星に振り回される毎日を過ごすことに。だが、冠星の不遜な態度の裏には誰にも言えない＂孤独＂と＂使命＂があったーー
description.zh: 在花街柳巷看人脸色吃饭的少年・宵某天突然被皇宫收留。原因是他被选为了皇子那盾牌一般存在的「替身侍卫」，在阴谋重重的皇宫中，宵是否能保卫皇子的安全呢——⁉两名相貌如出一辙的少年相遇后，历史自此发生了巨变‼

description.en:
"After several visits from the Reaper, Dohyung's life is constantly under peril. Although Dohyung is saved by the goblin, and falls in love with him, he won't easily reveal his identity... What is the fate of these two heading towards two different moments in time?" 

---
**Official English translations:**
[Pocket Comics](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/7767), [Lezhin US](https://www.lezhinus.com/en/comic/two_moments)

Entering a new series! The adventure of the strongest demon lord is far from over.  
  
At the lowest floor of the dungeon, the Demon Lord came face to face with a presence that appears to be the creator of this world.  
His next destination is the demon territory where there's an ongoing rivalry between devils.  
  
A new, incredibly energetic and cheerful high school girl has joined the gang. Once again, our character's bustling personalities and their idiosyncrasies will clash with each other.  
  
The long-awaited comical sequel of a comic adaptation of the popular fantasy, full of misunderstandings!
description.pt-br: Entrando em uma nova série! A aventura do lorde demônio mais forte está longe de terminar. No andar mais baixo da masmorra, o Lorde Demônio ficou cara a cara com uma presença que parece ser a criadora deste mundo. Seu próximo destino é o território demoníaco, onde há uma rivalidade contínua entre demônios. Uma nova, incrivelmente enérgica e alegre colegial se juntou à gangue. Mais uma vez, as personalidades agitadas do nosso personagem e suas idiossincrasias irão colidir umas com as outras. A aguardada sequência cômica de uma adaptação em quadrinhos da fantasia popular, cheia de mal-entendidos!

altTitles.en: A Saint Who Was Adopted by the Grand Duke
A Saintess Who Was Adopted by the Grand Duke
A Saint Adopted by the Grand Duke

altTitles.th: นักบุญหญิงผู้ถูกตระกูลแกรนด์ดยุกรับเลี้ยง

altTitles.es-la: Una Santa Adoptada Por El Gran Duque

description.en:
I was forced to live in captivity for the rest of my life because I happened to be aware of the fact that I was a saint. I was truly a 'real' saint, but that didn’t matter, because there was already a designated saint in the temple. When I died from all the abuse I endured, I was sent back to a time before all those previous events in my life had happened. After fifteen regressions, I was exhausted.

I prayed, "I don't want anything to do with this, so please just let me die."

And at the moment when I thought could finally be able to die, someone said, "How about being my daughter?"

…That monstrous grand duke adopted me.

---
"I want to quit. I don't want to live being exploited again."

Despite having the powers of a saint, she had to live her entire life in captivity—all for the sake of the fake saint who was anointed in secret. Unable to endure the torture any longer, she died alone and returned back in time. Daina, who chose a different path at the end of her forced repeated regressions, was adopted by the Grand Duke in a twist of fate…

"As the sole daughter of the Teresia family, I will make it so that you have everything."

Now that she has a new name and understands the importance of family, Daina decides to exact revenge so she can no longer be used by the temple.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8C%80%EA%B3%B5%EA%B0%80%EC%97%90-%EC%9E%85%EC%96%91%EB%90%9C-%EC%84%B1%EB%85%80%EB%8B%98/3524), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/61913707)
description.es-la: Me vi obligada a vivir en cautiverio por el resto de mi vida porque me di cuenta del hecho de que era una santa. Yo era verdaderamente una santa 'real', pero eso no importaba, porque ya había una santa designada en el templo. Cuando morí por todo el abuso que soporté, fui enviada de regreso a un tiempo antes de que sucedieran todos esos eventos anteriores en mi vida. Después de 15 regresiones, estaba exhausta. Oré: "No quiero tener nada que ver con esto, así que por favor déjame morir". Y en ese momento en que finalmente pude morir, alguien dijo: "¿Qué tal ser mi hija?" …. Ese monstruoso duque me había adoptado.

description.en:
Kang Sihwa was everyone's sun, always in the spotlight, and the people around Lee Eunseo were always jealous of her because of her special childhood friend Sihwa. One day, Sihwa, who had suddenly disappeared, returned a few years later. With the swaying of Eunseo’s heart and Sihwa’s unpredictable behavior. We have a special relationship, right? Don't you think so? But… I still want to ask. What are we both doing?

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=10965984)
description.ko: 모두의 태양이자 주목받는 존재인 강시화, 그런 시화와 특별한 소꿉 친구 사이로 주변의 질투를 받던 이은서. 어느 날 홀연히 사라졌던 시화가 몇 년이 흘러 돌아왔다. 자꾸 흔들리는 은서의 마음과 도저히 짐작할 수 없는 시화의 행동. 우리는 특별한 사이잖아? 너도 그렇게 생각하지? 하지만… 묻고 싶어. 너랑 난 뭐하는 사이야?
description.tr: Kang Sihwa, doğal bir dışadönük olarak her zaman ilgi odağıydı ve Lee Eunseo, Sihwa onun özel çocukluk arkadaşı olduğu için çevresindekilere kıskançlıkla bakıyordu. Bir gün aniden ortadan kaybolan Sihwa, birkaç yıl sonra geri döndü. Eunseo’nun kalbi sürekli çırpınırken Si-hwa’nın davranışları tahmin edilemezdi. Bizim özel bir ilişkimiz var, değil mi? Sen de öyle düşünüyorsun, değil mi? Ama… Sormak istiyorum. Bizim ilişkimiz tam olarak nedir?

title.en: Rabukome to Kaijuu Taiji no Fumonritsu

altTitles.ja: ラブコメと怪獣退治の不文律

altTitles.en: The Unwritten Rules of Romantic Comedy and Monster Extermination

description.en:
Tubura Enjo, a high school girl with a shy and timid personality, has two close connections in her life: her childhood friend Anna and her classmate Sho, who is a big fan of special effects (tokusatsu) films.

One day, while exploring her late grandfather's storage room, she discovers an old ring. When she puts it on, she is suddenly transported 50 years into the past, right into the middle of a scene with a giant monster! To her shock, she finds herself on the set of a tokusatsu film, directed by her grandfather in his youth. 

Overwhelmed and scared, she is instructed by her young grandfather to help defeat the monster, leading to a tearful yet courageous battle against the giant creature!
description.ja: 小動物系女子高生・円城つぶら。親友は幼馴染のアンナ、気になるクラスメイトは特撮オタのショウ。ある日、特撮監督だった祖父の物置で見つけたリングを身に着けると…突然50年前にタイムスリップ！　目の前には巨大怪獣が！　足元でカメラを回している若き日の祖父ちゃんに指示出しされ、泣きながら怪獣退治に挑むことに…。

description.en: A reclusive son, a daughter looking for sugar daddies, and a cheating husband. "This family is a failure." Noriko, a housewife who thinks so, has no dreams or hopes for the future, and her days just pass by. However, her fate changes dramatically when she impulsively kills her husband's boss. "The only way for the whole family to live happily is to hide the body." A strange bond is formed as the broken family cooperates in concealing the body.

"You’re its prey the moment you touch it." 

One day, a terrible virus variant attacks Seoul! 

Yeon-woo is on a school trip to Seoul, and is excited thinking that he can finally get along with his one classmate, So-yeon, whom he has a crush on.

However, during this time, unidentified cells appeared in front of Yeon-woo’s class, who were sightseeing in Seoul. The mutant cells manifestation quickly turns Yeon-woo and his classmates’ school trip into hell as anyone who comes into contact with the cells will become a hideous monster that wants to consume anything with flesh...! 

Will Yeon-woo be able to leave Seoul safely?
description.pt-br: Yeon Woo está apaixonado. Ele não tem olhos pra mais nada além da So Yeon. Na escola ele não conseguiu falar com ela, mas agora que eles estão indo pra uma excursão escolar em Seoul, ele tem esperança de conseguir pelo menos começar a conversar com ela, mesmo apesar de ser muito introvertido. Porém, tem coisas estranhas acontecendo em Seoul… Algo terrível está prestes a dominar a cidade… Nesse dia, Seoul de repente é…?

description.en:
“[Class: Hotel Manager (Hidden) awakened!]

Mac x Mo x Gol x Coffee turns into potions,
A mysterious hotel where staying for a day restores stamina.
Awakened as the manager of this place!

All guests are hunters, and the hotel is in the middle of a dungeon.
Just by putting on a business smile, money rolls in, right?!

“Welcome, welcome to the Yeongchun Hotel!”

altTitles.en: How to Survive as the Devil's Daughter
How to Survive as the Devil's Child

description.en: Bliss has been endlessly reborn and forced to watch the world be destroyed at the hands of Lucas Brandt, king of the demon world. In her most recent life, she comes to... as a newborn baby lying right outside of Lucas' manor! Not only that, but she resembles Lucas so much that she could only be his daughter! Surrounded by Lucas' minions who've slaughtered her in countless past lives, all Bliss can do now is bide her time until she can get her revenge and succeed in saving the world!

title.en: I Will Divorce the Female Lead's Siscon Brother

altTitles.en: I Will Divorce the Female Lead's Older Brother

altTitles.es-la: Me divorciaré del hermano Siscon de la protagonista femenina

description.en:
Ethel, who reincarnated into her favorite novel, has married the female lead’s brother Liena. She thought her marriage life was genuine, but soon enough she became tired of a husband who cared only for his sister and whose attention was always centered on Liena, yet was cold to her, so she filed for divorce.

“Divorce? Absolutely not!”

However, her opponent is a powerful duke, so she turns to Terrence, the villain of the original story to be her assistant for a smooth divorce.

“The only person I want to have by my side is you, Ethel.”

…But this man’s fate is to be hurt by Liena.

As the more she knew about Terrence, the more he seemed attractive to her?

altTitles.en: I Raised Him Modestly, But He Came Back Obsessed With Me

altTitles.th: เลี้ยงมาให้เป็นเด็กดี แต่ดันกลับมาหลงฉันซะงั้น

altTitles.zh: 精心培养后他化身偏执男回来了

altTitles.zh-hk: 養過的少年變成執着男人回來了

altTitles.ja: 慎ましく育てたはずの大公に執着されています

altTitles.es-la: Lo Críe Con Cuidado, Pero Volvió Como Un Hombre Obsesionado Conmigo

altTitles.en: I Raised A Boy Kindly But He Returned As An Obsessive Man

description.en:
After being reborn as a desolate fire witch and villain destined to die a tragic death, Chersinia creates a plan to avoid her fate by gambling at a casino to become a wealthy recluse. 

The only problem? She somehow ends up with a slave boy named Ben instead of the money she needs! 

But much to her surprise, she starts to warm up to Ben, who provides the perfect joy and comfort in her lonely life. Little does she know that Ben has a dark secret that will change her life forever...

title.en: In the Shadow of the Spring

description.en: After leaving her hometown of Cheongna with a sense of finality, Chahui had no choice but to return. However, upon her return, she finds herself overwhelmed by the weight of poverty and unhappiness. Amid this struggle, her first love and ex-boyfriend, Wookyung, whom she hurt and parted ways with, continues to linger around her. Wookyung, who still seems to have feelings for Chahui, subtly makes advances as naturally as breathing. Although Chahuu's heart wavers in response, she knows she must turn away despite her feelings. This is the poignant story of Chahuu's first love.

altTitles.ja: 悪党たちに育てられてます！

altTitles.pt-br: Eu Estou Sendo Criada por Vilões

description.en:
I thought I was an illegitimate child… but it turns out that I was a complete stranger?!

A year after transmigrating as an extra, I found out that I was on the verge of being kicked out.

I said I’d rather leave the house on my own.

“Actually, this child is my daughter. Right, daughter?”

Did I catch the attention of the psychopathic duke?

‘I heard that the money he gave after playing with someone was enough to buy an island?’

I got along with him as his daughter because I thought I could get his fortune later on. And a few months later, I would leave his house with a thick bank account.

“Stay by my side until I tell you to leave.”

However, my dad, who regarded me as a toy, came looking for me and held me back.

=

After returning home due to dad’s persuasion, the families and my dad fought to adopt me. My uncles and aunts gathered to protect me, and future psychos began to have strange obsessions over me.

“Happy Birthday, Ayrin. You’re the head as of today.”

On top of that, the duke’s position was my birthday present.
Everything is going just as I expected.

[Hey, how long are you going to sleep? Grandma said she is gonna take you off life support!]
[Cha Miso, you’re going to die!]

What is that voice?
Will I be okay like this? (Synopsis: Gourmet Scans)
description.tr: Gayrimeşru bir çocuk olduğumu sanıyordum… ama tamamen yabancı olduğum ortaya çıktı?! Yan karakter olarak beden değiştirdikten bir yıl sonra kovulmanın eşiğinde olduğumu öğrendim. Evden tek başıma çıkmayı tercih ederim dedim. “Aslında bu çocuk benim kızım. Değil mi kızım?” Psikopat dükün dikkatini mi çektim ? "Biriyle oynadıktan sonra verdiği paranın bir ada almaya yettiğini duydum?" Onunla kızı olarak iyi anlaştım çünkü daha sonra servetini ele geçirebileceğimi düşündüm ve birkaç ay sonra onun evinden kalın bir banka hesabıyla ayrılmayı planladım. "Sana gitmeni söyleyene kadar yanımda kal." Ancak beni oyuncak gibi gören babam beni aramaya geldi ve beni tuttu. *** Babamın iknasıyla eve döndükten sonra aileler ve babam beni evlat edinmek için mücadele etti. Amcalarım ve teyzelerim beni korumak için toplandılar ve geleceğin psikopatları bana karşı garip saplantılar beslemeye başladılar. "Doğum günün kutlu olsun Ayrin. Bugün itibariyle başkan sensin.” Üstelik Dük'ün konumu benim doğum günü hediyemdi. Her şey beklediğim gibi gidiyor. [Hey, daha ne kadar uyuyacaksın? Büyükanne sana tutucunu çıkarmanı söyledi!] [Cha Miso, öleceksin!] Bu ses nedir? Böyle iyi olacak mıyım?
description.pt-br: Negligenciada por sua família, Cha Miso sonha em viver em seu romance favorito como a amada personagem principal. Então, um dia, ela acorda dentro do romance, mas como Eiryn Etam, uma personagem secundária oprimida que será expulsa de sua casa! Para evitar mais negligência, ela planeja ir embora antes que isso aconteça. Mas quando Erno Etam, o herdeiro maluco da Casa Etam, afirma que Eiryn é sua filha, seus planos são frustrados e Eiryn se vê no meio de um conflito entre a Casa Etam e um elenco de vilões.

title.en: I Became the Childhood Friend of the Obsessive Second Male Lead

description.en: Rieta, staying with a military ducal family, decided to help Noel, the second male lead, by coaching him on winning the female lead’s heart. After years of guidance, Rieta was confident Noel would succeed. However, in a surprising twist, Noel complimented Rieta instead, misapplying her advice. Flustered, Rieta realized her friend had taken her words to heart, but not in the way she intended.

altTitles.ja: シロップ PURE おねロリ百合アンソロジー

description.en:
Cover illustration: En Morikura
1. Otonaninaritai (大人になりたい) by Hamuro Kei
2. Yakusoku (やくそく) by Maeya Susumu
3. V to Hatsukoi (vと初恋) by Yuzuki Ryota
4. Suriel (スーリール) by Tsuzura Ryo
5. Ohayou kara Oyasumi made (おはようからおやすみまで) by Mikan Uji
6. Moto JK to mi JK (元JKと未JK) by Tachi
7. CANDY GUILTY (CANDY GUILTY) by Yoshidamaru Yuu
8. Para ni Kiss (パラにキス) by Akitsu Kio
9. Tsumugu no Mahou (ツムグの魔法) by Itou Hachi
10. Kodomo no Mama de (こどものままで) by Iwami Kiyoko

altTitles.ja: 推し様なのでパパにしました

altTitles.th: เมื่อฉันอุปถัมภ์คุณพ่อจอมวายร้าย

altTitles.vi: Nhận Nuôi Người Cha Phản Diện
Xin Hãy Nhận Con Làm Con Đi Mà, Papa

description.en:
One day I woke up and I was six years old. I had transmigrated into the main character of a tragic novel, Saint Priscilla, who walks through all sorts of thorny paths! Since I’m here, I need to avoid the scheduled special misfortune and live happily with my favorite character. The final boss of the story and the villain, Melchizedek, the tyrant of the Rehel Empire, who has no blood or tears! A happy life of adopting my father and becoming a princess, with my favorite character. I also saved the male protagonist, in order to remove my father’s death flag.

“If you approach my daughter, you will die.”

Why does my father keep putting up death flags?

Moreover… “If you tamed me, you have to take responsibility.”

Why is the male lead so obsessed with me? What’s going on?

---
One day, a girl awakens as 6-year-old St. Priscilla, the heroine of her most cherished novel. The catch? She is destined to suffer with an abusive adoptive family! To avoid this, she adopts her ultimate bias, the ruthless Emperor Melkiades, as her father instead. Although spending her days fangirling and redeeming her bias's tarnished name seems like a dream come true, with so many foes still lurking in the shadows, can this young saint protect Melkiades and find happiness for them both?
description.ko:
어느 날 눈을 뜨니 여섯 살이 되어있었다.
내가 빙의한 건 온갖 가시밭길을 걷는 피폐 소설 속 주인공, 성녀 프리실라!

이왕 이렇게 된 거, 예정된 특급 불행을 피하고 최애캐와 행복하게 살아야 한다.
작중 최종 보스이자 악당,
피도 눈물도 없는 레헬 제국의 폭군, 멜키아데와 함께!

아빠를 입양해서 공주도 되고, 최애캐 덕질도 하는 행복한 인생.
아빠의 사망 플래그도 제거할 겸, 겸사겸사 남주인공도 구해줬는데...

"내 딸한테 접근하면 죽는다."

아빠는 왜 이렇게 자꾸 사망 플래그를 꽂는 거지?
게다가...

"날 길들였으면 책임도 져야지."

어쩐지 남주까지 내게 집착하는데, 이게 어떻게 된 거지...?

description.en:
Shiratori Tatsuhiko was a bum wandering the streets with no money to his name when he meets Mako. He works as a scout for an agency called Burst that recruits girls on the streets for adult entertainment in the Shinjuku area of Tokyo. Tatsuhiko quickly learns the techniques of scouting and is even more attracted to how much money he can make. But with how the industry is maintained, Tatsuhiko has to deal with the lying, deception, violence, greed and even the yakuza. He wants to keep the morals that he has, but it gets progressively harder and harder as he gets deeper into the other side of society.  
  
The manga ran for 38 volumes between 2005 and 2013 in YM.

Mumyeong Heo’s grandmother passed away years ago. But when he visits her home to spend some time in the quiet countryside, he notices that someone kept it clean all this time.
His new neighbors aren’t exactly thrilled by his visit. In fact, most of them don’t want him around.
But that’s when his nasty neighbors go missing one by one… for better or worse.

It was the day Chiichan, who never comes to middle school at all, suddenly showed up in her tattered sweats with dead insects, causing a commotion in the class. Yuua has been with her since kindergarten and cares about her, and her classmate Koudai asks if he can help Chiichan out...
A new series born from a unique collaboration, in which Oshimi Shuuzou depicts the prequel to Chiichan, the aberrant heroine of Naitou Eisuke's film *Poison Girl*, as an original manga *Chiichan*!
description.fr: Chii, qui ne vient habituellement pas en cours, se présente un jour vétue de haillons, et un insecte à la main. De quoi faire parler la classe...
description.es-la: Chii-chan, quien rara vez asiste a la escuela secundaria, que viste un desgastado chándal y tiene un hobby peculiar. Un día hace algo que causa miedo en el salón, por lo que, dos jóvenes tratan de ayudarla. Esta nueva serie es una colaboración en la que Shūzō Oshimi dibuja la precuela del extraordinario personaje de Chii-chan, la inusual personaje de la película "Doku Musume" dirigida por Eirō Naitō.

altTitles.ja: ポケットモンスター リバースト

description.en: The story begins with the protagonist leaving his town where people and Pokémon live in peace together in order to locate his father. The hero doesn’t know much about his father besides the fact that he is a powerful swordsman. On his journey, the protagonist meets up with new friends and foes and discovers the power of Burst Heart Crystals, these crystals entrap a Pokémon inside and allow humans transform themselves partly into them in order to take advantage of their special abilities and attacks.

Goku and friends battle intergalactic evil in the greatest action-adventure-fantasy-comedy-fighting series ever! Legend has it that if all seven of the precious orbs called “Dragon Balls” are gathered together, an incredibly powerful dragon god will appear to grant one wish. Unfortunately, the orbs are scattered across the world, making them extremely difficult to collect. Enter 16-year-old Bulma, a scientific genius who has constructed a radar to detect the exact locations of the Dragon Balls. She’s on a mission to find all seven orbs, but first she must convince young Son Goku to join her on her quest. With a monkey tail, superhuman strength and a magic staff for a weapon, Son Goku is ready to set out on the adventure of a lifetime…

altTitles.ja-ro: Boku no Kokoro no Yabai Yatsu

description.de:
Der Teenager Ichikawa Kyoutarou gehört zu den allerletzten auf seiner Schule. Neben seinen Bemühungen, Unterhaltungen mit einer bestimmten Klassenkameradin aufrechtzuerhalten, muss er sich außerdem noch dafür zusammenreißen, mörderische Dränge aus den Tiefen seiner Seele zu verbergen.

Eigentlich ist es aber eine niedliche Liebesgeschichte zwischen einem geistig gestörten Jungen und einer fröhlichen, leicht komisch, jedoch schönen Mädchen.
description.en:
A ‘fearsome psycho-thriller’ centering on the ‘dark side of adolescence’.

Following Ichikawa Kyoutarou, a teenage boy belonging to the very bottom caste of his school, this work details his troubled interactions with a certain classmate, and his attempt to hide murderous impulses that find themselves in the darkest recesses of his soul.

In reality, though, it's a sweet youth rom-com between a messed up boy and a bright, if somewhat strange, beautiful girl.

- Won the Tsugi ni Kuru Web Manga 2020 Award.
- Was nominated for the 2020 and 2021 Manga Taisho Award.
- Won the top prize of 2021 Tsutaya Comic Awards
description.ja:
学園カースト頂点の美少女・山田杏奈の殺害を妄想してはほくそ笑む、重度の中二病の陰キャ・市川京太郎。だが山田を観察する内に、京太郎が思う「底辺を見下す陽キャ」とは全然違うことに徐々に気づいていき…!? 陰キャ男子

---

- Exclusive art is occasionally posted to [the series' official account](https://twitter.com/boku__yaba/status/1060017522303414273)
description.ru: «Страшный психо-триллер», сосредоточенный на «тёмной стороне юности». История повествует о Киотаро Ичикаве — человеке, находящемся на самой низшей ступени в своей школе и скрывающем убийственный порыв, находящийся в самой глубине его души... на деле же, это милый ром-ком про странного мальчика и прекрасную, хоть и слегка странную, девушку.
description.es-la:
La historia trata sobre un joven llamado Kyotaro Ichikawa que sufre de un caso grave de “chūnibyō” y se divierte imaginando la muerte de una hermosa chica llamada Anna Yamada, quien está en la cima de la jerarquía social de la escuela. Sin embargo, mientras observa a Yamada, Kyotaro comienza a darse cuenta de que ella es muy diferente de lo que él pensaba.

 - Ganó el premio Tsugi ni Kuru Web Manga 2020.
- Fue nominado para el premio Manga Taisho en 2020 y 2021.
- Ganó el primer premio en los premios Tsutaya Comic de 2021.
description.pt-br:
Um "intenso thriller psicológico" centralizado no lado obscuro da adolescência. 

O mangá gira em torno de Kyoutaro Ichikawa, uma pessoa no fundo da hierarquia de sua escola, que esconde um impulso assassino no fundo de sua alma. Mas na realidade, é uma doce comédia romântica entre um garoto confuso e uma garota brilhante, embora um tanto estranha e bonita.

title.en: Ano Toki Tasukete Itadaita Monster Musume desu.

altTitles.ja: あのとき助けていただいたモンスター娘です。
「あのとき助けていただいたモンスター娘です。」異世界おっさん教師 突然のモテ期に困惑する

altTitles.ja-ro: "Ano Toki Tasukete Itadaita Monster Musume desu.": Isekai Ossan Kyoushi Totsuzen no Moteki ni Konwaku suru

altTitles.zh: 那个时候被你拯救了的那个魔物娘是我的说。

altTitles.vi: Cô bé ấy là con quái vật mà tôi đã cứu lấy năm xưa

description.en: Some 20 years have passed since the protagonist was summoned to another world and retired from the army. He is still single in his 40s and lives as a low-ranking professor, until one day, an elite 'monster girl' transfers into his class.
description.ja: 異世界に召喚され、軍を退役してから約20年。主人公は未だ独身で、もう40代も半ば。Eランクの落ちこぼれ教師として生活するある日、彼の学園にエリートの「モンスター娘」が転校してくるのだった。。
description.vi: Câu chuyện về một ông giáo trung niên (trước đây là một anh hùng) ở dị giới tình cờ gặp lại cô học trò vốn dĩ là con bạch tuộc cute phô mai que mà anh từng cứu giúp và dạy dỗ trước đây.
description.pt-br: Cerca de 20 anos se passaram desde que o protagonista foi convocado para outro mundo e se aposentou do exército. Ele ainda está solteiro na casa dos 40 anos e vive como um professor de baixo escalão, até que um dia, uma 'garota monstro' de elite é transferida para sua classe.

description.en:
Hong Il-tak, the only red spot at Daemun Namgo. Despite his name and nickname, he's a boy, and his dwarfism and peculiar appearance have led to him being looked down upon by everyone from the nerds to the elders, and he's at the bottom of the school hierarchy. 

In the past, until his sophomore year, Iltak had been a famous member of the Iljin, but a problem of his own brought him to the bottom of the food chain... 

"His secondary sexuality. If only he'd come to me...!" 

After enduring daily teasing and bullying because his body stopped growing like his peers, Hong Il-taek thought of a way to move up in the ranks... 

"If I can befriend this guy, who's in the second grade at Dae-moon Boys' High School, I'll be able to move up again!" 

But for some reason, Lee Hyun-woo tries to keep his distance from Hong Il-taek... Can Hong Il-taek find his former glory again?

She's a second-year high school student with a single all-consuming question: Will the boy she likes ever really notice her? He's the school's most notorious juvenile delinquent and he's suddenly come to a shocking realization: He's got a huge crush, and now he must tell her how he feels.  
  
Chapter 232 does not exist, there's no chapters missing.  
  
Special Chapters:  
  
bb1 What's up Doc (February 9, 2010)  
Diamonds on the Inside (November 30, 2016)  
Give it Away (March 15, 2017)  
Hello Again (November 8, 2017)
description.pt-br:
Ela é uma estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio com uma única pergunta que a consome: será que o garoto de quem ela gosta realmente a notará? Ele é o delinquente juvenil mais notório da escola e de repente chega a uma conclusão chocante: ele tem uma paixão enorme e agora deve contar a ela como se sente.

O capítulo 232 não existe, não falta nenhum capítulo.

Capítulos Especiais:

bb1 E aí, doutor (9 de fevereiro de 2010)
Diamantes por dentro (30 de novembro de 2016)
Como percebeu (15 de março de 2017)
Olá de novo (8 de novembro de 2017)

description.en: 29-year-old freeter Ikuta Hiroto is a carefree young man without a love life, regular job, or any real worries about the future. He inherits an old house from the neighbourhood granny, where his 18-year-old cousin, Natsumi moves in with him to study art in Tokyo. This is a story about Hiroto and the people around him who struggle with life.
description.ru: Двадцатидевятилетний работник на полставки Икута Хирото — беззаботный парень, у которого нет ни личной жизни, ни постоянной работы, ни каких-либо беспокойств о собственном будущем. В наследство от соседской бабушки ему достаётся старый дом, куда переезжает его восемнадцатилетняя двоюродная сестра Нацуми, чтобы учиться искусству в Токио. Это история о Хирото и окружающих его людях, которые борются с жизнью.
description.uk: 29-річний Ікута Хірото — безтурботний молодий чоловік без особистого життя, постійної роботи та реальних турбот про майбутнє. Він успадковує старий будинок від сусідської бабусі, куди переїжджає його 18-річна двоюрідна сестра Нацумі, щоб вивчати мистецтво в Токіо. Це історія про Хірото та людей навколо нього, які борються з життям.
description.pt-br: Ikuta Hiroto, de 29 anos, é um jovem despreocupado sem uma vida amorosa, emprego regular ou qualquer preocupação real com o futuro: um "freeter". Ele herda uma velha casa da avó do bairro, onde sua prima de 18 anos, Natsumi, vai morar com ele para estudar arte em Tóquio. Esta é uma história sobre Hiroto e as pessoas ao seu redor que lutam contra a vida.

description.en: My senpai challenges me to a fight with her, but if I win... Will she become my girlfriend!?

altTitles.ja: ハーフサキュバスを拾った

altTitles.es-la: Llevando a casa una medio súcubo

altTitles.vi: Tôi nhặt về nhà một bán Succubus

description.en: Take a child half succubus and half human.
description.id: Mungut anak setengah succubus dan setengah Manusia

description.en:
"It may be hazy blue, but that's alright"

Taking place a year after the epilogue of Seasons of Blossom, this story focuses on the new opening of “Cafe Blossom and NEMONE Atelier” as well as Bomi’s new classmate “Pureum” as they explore a new found youth. 

Campus romance, after school romance, office romance, it has it all.  

The heartwarming series is back with another youthful story!
description.fr:
« Ça peut être d'un bleu brumeux, mais c'est pas grave. »

Se déroulant un an après l'épilogue de "Seasons of Blossom", cette histoire se concentre sur la nouvelle ouverture du « Café Blossom and NEMONE Atelier », ainsi que sur la nouvelle camarade de classe de Bomi, « Pureum », alors qu'ils explorent une nouvelle jeunesse. Romance sur le campus, amours après l'école, romance au bureau, il y a de tout. La série réconfortante revient avec une nouvelle histoire pleine de jeunesse !
